description: A pair of very short black swim briefs.  Commonly used by male competitive swimmers and bodybuilders.
A pair of blue swim briefs.  Commonly used by male competitive swimmers.
A tightly fitted, skin-tight head garment made of Lycra.  Commonly used by recreational and competitive swimmers.
A pair of swimming trunks, with netting.
A pair of 3 mm split-toe neoprene diving socks with thin rubber soles.
A pair of 5 mm thick neoprene diving boots with thick soles.
//: These will have an ablative armor slot for fins, as diving boots are designed to be worn with those.

pocket_data.description: mounting for a pair of fins.

description: A pair of rubber flippers worn on the feet, which improve swimming speed while greatly impeding the wearer's ability to walk.
//: Most fins have some way of adjustment as of now, so OVERSIZE flag.

description: A full-body 3 mm thick neoprene wetsuit with nylon lining.
A full-body 5 mm thick neoprene wetsuit with nylon lining.
A 3 mm neoprene hood, commonly worn by divers.
A 5 mm thick neoprene hood, commonly worn by divers in cold weather.
A long-sleeved neoprene jacket.  Keeps you warm and protected from the elements.
A short-sleeved neoprene shirt.  Good for use on the beach.
A thin long-sleeved neoprene shirt.  Good for surfing and other water sports.
A long-sleeved neoprene shirt.  Good for surfing and other water sports.
A pair of light and stretchy thin neoprene pants.  Good for surfing and other water sports.
A pair of light and stretchy neoprene pants.  Good for surfing and other water sports.
A pair of light and stretchy neoprene shorts.  Good for use on the beach.
A pair of stretchy neoprene shorts with large pockets.  Can be worn alone or adjusted to be worn over a wetsuit.
//2: A recipe to make these into leg pouches?
//3: Two large pockets separated into four, two small zipper pockets on flaps, four bungee loops.

description: A pair of stretchy neoprene shorts with large pockets.  Can be worn over a wetsuit or adjusted to be worn alone.
A long-sleeved spring wetsuit with pink color details and cleavage-enhancing, hip-accentuating construction.  Not as protective as a full-body suit, but also less restrictive.
A sleeveless spring wetsuit with an ocean blue color and cleavage-enhancing, hip-accentuating construction.  Not as protective as a full-body suit, but also less restrictive.
A one-piece chainmail suit used by SCUBA divers for protection against shark bites.  It has been conductively interconnected, protecting against electricity.
A-one piece chainmail suit used by SCUBA divers for protection against shark bites.
//: Will be based on this: https://www.hammacher.com/product/chainmail-sharkproof-suit, helmet will be a separate piece

description: A full-face diving mask that covers the face and eyes.  Can be equipped with any common scuba regulator to protect from drowning and other dangers, though the process needs some time and knowledge.
A high-end modular full-face diving mask that covers the face and eyes.  Can be equipped with proprietary adapters for scuba tanks or rebreather cartridges to protect from drowning and other dangers.
//: Based on Kirby Morgan M-48 MOD-1 mask
